page.title: 11Old Peoples Home-Dorking NE
page.content: Because{medical care}is improving all the time,people live to be much older now and there is more need for homes for the old people ,who can't be looked after by their families. We visited an old people's home.It had beautiful surroundings and the house was large and airy. The home's oldest resident is 93.The home can cater for{21 people}living there. There is a{special chair}for the residents who can't walk up the stairs. In the day residents read,knit,talk and go to visit relations.At the weekend they get most visitors. Most of the old people are fit and heathly.There is a large cat as the home's pet. The old peoples home employ{7 staff altogether.
